frame.name: Being_rotted
frame.definition: <def-root>An organic item, the <fen>Patient</fen>, has undergone the natural process of rotting and decaying with a possible expression of the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the rotting has occurred. <ex><fex name="Patient">The coconut milk</fex> became <t>rancid</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Patient
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Patient</fen> is the organic matter that has decayed. <ex><fex name="Patient">The coconut milk</fex> became <t>rancid</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which rotting has occurred. <ex>The coconut milk was <fex name="Degree">so</fex> <t>rancid</t>.</ex></def-root>
